SiteConfig: MySite # The name of your XenDesktop site. For example: "MySite". MySQLServer # The name of your SQL server or SQL server instance (e.g. "SQLServer1.mycompany.com" or "SQLCTX01.mycompany.com\InStance1"). 1433 # The SQL port number (1433 by default) CTX_Site_DB # The name for the site database. For example: "CTX_Site_DB". CTX_Logging_DB # The name for the logging database. For example: "CTX_Logging_DB". CTX_Monitoring_DB # The name for the monitoring database. For example: "CTX_Monitoring_DB". MyLicenseServer # The name of your license server, for example: mylicserver.mycompany.com. 27000 # The port number for the initial contact, for example 27000 (this is the default value) UserDevice # The licensing model. Possible values are UserDevice and Concurrent. XDT # The product code. Possible values are XDT (for XenDesktop) or MPS (for the XenDesktop 7.x App Edition). PLT # The product edition. Possible values are STD (Standard), ENT (Enterprise) or PLT (Platinum). MyDomain\MyAdminGroup # The name of the Active Directory user or group, for example "MyDomain\CTXAdmins". Full Administrator # The role to assign to the new XenDesktop administrator. The following built-in roles are available: All # The scope (the objects) to which the permissions (defined in the role) apply 365 </SiteConfig
